name: TinyDivider

border-style.description: Sets the style of the divider, which has an optional value of solid / dashed
border-style.description_zh: 设置分隔线的样式，该属性的可选值为 solid / dashed

color.description: Sets the color of the divider

content-background-color.description: Set the background color for the divider copy
content-background-color.description_zh: 设置分割线文案的背景颜色

content-color.description: Set the color of the divider copy
content-color.description_zh: 设置分隔线文案的颜色

content-position.description: Sets the location of the divider copy, which has an optional value of left / center / right
content-position.description_zh: 设置分隔线文案的位置，该属性的可选值为 left / center / right

direction.description: Sets the direction of the divider, which has an optional value of horizontal / vertical
direction.description_zh: 设置分隔线的方向，该属性的可选值为 horizontal / vertical

description: Divider 分割线组件，用于对不同内容的分隔。
description_zh: Divider 分割线组件，用于对不同内容的分隔。
